body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
There are two places where high-level task queues are validated:
* In frontend workflow handler: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/main/service/frontend/workflow_handler.go#L4041
* And in history service command checker: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/main/service/history/command_checker.go#L809
These two validations apply different rules and defaults.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Task queue validation should be moved to a common helper and standardized across the code base.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
title: Standardize task queue validation
